title: Lee Sin Jungle Combo?
body:
So basically whenever I play Lee Sin I'm sure I'm not clearing my jungle camps properly. I usually rotate through my abilities like so:
Q - AA - AA - Q - AA - AA - W - AA - AA - W - AA - AA - E - AA - AA - E - AA - AA (and repeat)
I'm sure there is a much faster way to clear all camps (because by the time I do my E, my Q is back up or something like that). Can anyone type in the ability combo, with auto-attacks included? Thanks.

replies.body: I don't play lee sin much and I'm unsure of the CD on his abilties but usually when im engaging in a camp I go Q - E - AA - AA - W - AA - AA - Q - AA - AA etc keep in mind I'm only bronze so don't expect expert tips or any strategies
Bump. x3 No Lee Sin players out there?
Try looking up a youtuber like foxdrop or  watching a stream/high elo game with a lee in it :)
